message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $850,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, thanks for your offer.  I appreciate you seeing the value in the product. However, my bottom line is closer to $1,100,000.  I believe this price reflects its true worth. Would you be willing to meet me somewhere in the middle?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $950,000. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually agreeable solution.
